To be eligible, Detroit residents must meet income guidelines and have a notice to quit or a court order summons, complaint or judgment against them. Renters will qualify based on their current household income and family size.
Residents that complete the online intake form will receive a response in less than 72 hours.

After the intake form is completed, the Eviction Assistance Program will determine which resources are best suited for residents, including legal representation, rental assistance and relocation assistance.
Detroit residents at risk for eviction should go to http://DetroitEvictionHelp.com or call 866-313-2520 to start the process.

Coverage for Recently Unemployed: Thanks to the ACA, nearly half a million workers who lost their jobs this year have gotten health insurance through the ACA marketplaces.

Key Support for Rural Hospitals: ACA significantly reduced uncompensated care costs. Between 2013 and 2015, hospitals‚Äô uncompensated care costs decreased by 30%. As hospitals face an influx in coronavirus patients, it is critical that they are paid for the treatment they provide.

Medicaid Expansion: ACA helps states expand Medicaid to vulnerable populations. 17 million+ Americans now have coverage through Medicaid expansion. Importantly, Medicaid‚Äôs funding structure allows funds to increase in response to a public health emergency like coronavirus.
Increased CDC Funding: The ACA established the CDC Prevention and Public Health Fund, which helps states prepare for disease outbreaks.

Coverage for 20+ Million People: Because of the ACA, more than 20 million Americans gained health coverage. People with insurance are much more likely to see a doctor when they are sick and to get the treatment they need.

Protections for as Many as 133 Million Americans With Preexisting Conditions: Under the ACA, insurance companies are not allowed to discriminate against those with preexisting conditions by denying them coverage or charging higher rates.

Access to Vaccinations Without Cost Sharing: Once a COVID vaccine is developed, ACA will almost certainly cover the coronavirus vaccine without cost-sharing, because it requires plans to cover all vaccinations recommended by the CDC‚Äôs Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices

Comprehensive Coverage: The ACA established what are known as ‚Äúessential health benefits,‚Äù mandating coverage of services like prescription drugs and hospitalization. Coronavirus testing and treatment are essential health benefits and must be covered by all ACA-compliant plans.
In the midst of a global pandemic, the ACA is one of our most critical tools.
